pages.text: This is a list of every huge mushroom on Mars, and what climates they grow in.$(br2)Looking for particular type of mushroom stem to decorate your base? This should help you find it. The list is sorted alphabetically by stem type.$(br2)Also check out the $(l:tfc:arborfirmacraft/earth_tree_index)Earth Tree Index$().

pages.title: Aeronos
pages.text: $(bold)Aeronos Mushroom$()$(br)$(thing)Temperature$(): -100°C and above$(br)Appears more often to the East.

pages.title: Alphacene
pages.text: $(bold)Alphacene Mushroom$()$(br)$(thing)Temperature$(): -85°C and above$(br)Appears both to the East and West.

pages.title: Crimson
pages.text: $(bold)Crimson Mushroom$()$(br)$(thing)Temperature$(): -109 — -13°C$(br)Appears more often to the East.

pages.title: Glacian
pages.text: $(bold)Glacian Mushroom$()$(br)$(thing)Temperature$(): -107°C and below$(br)Appears both to the East and West.

pages.title: Strophar
pages.text: $(bold)Strophar Mushroom$()$(br)$(thing)Temperature$(): -100°C and above$(br)Appears more often to the West.

pages.title: Warped
pages.text: $(bold)Warped Mushroom$()$(br)$(thing)Temperature$(): -109 — -13°C$(br)Appears more often to the West.
